translations.Browse and view your \"souvenirs\" album: Navegue e veja seus álbuns de "souvenir" na interface web do nextcloud
translations.View and share albums made by the [Souve:
View and share albums made by the [Souvenirs Android application](https://github.com/zorgluf/souvenirs-android).
    \nThis application is just a viewer. No album creation or edition features are available at the moment. You will need to create albums using the Android app and sync them to your Nextcloud server.
Clique para baixar o álbum em um arquivo zip.
